channel.description: Identity Governance Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 761 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: This guide defines and outlines PAM, IGA, and the differences between them and IAM, and how you have to pay for them separately as they are enabled in different SKUs. Page type: Concept Content type: Conceptual overview
